alert.note: Alert for Berks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Berks County through 330 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shoemakersville, or 11 miles southeast of Schuylkill Haven, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamburg, Fleetwood, Laureldale, Leesport, Shoemakersville, Bernville, Lenhartsville, Fairview Hgts and Centerport. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 23 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
